summary: The VA is replacing its aging financial and acquisition systems with an integrated system. Two previous attempts to replace the systems cost hundreds of millions of dollars and took years to develop. In November 2020, VA deployed the new system at the National Cemetery Administration. VA followed some IT best practices, e.g., in system testing. But VA's cost and schedule estimates only minimally or partially...
title: Veterans Affairs: Ongoing Financial Management System Modernization Program Would Benefit from Improved Cost and Schedule Estimating
